actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act of 1974 to prohibit the use of funds provided under such act for payment of wages to draft evaders and deserters.

summary.text: Prohibits the use of funds provided under the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act for payment of wages to draft evaders and deserters.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act of 1974 to prohibit the use of funds provided under such act for payment of wages to draft evaders and deserters.
